item.title: Decoding Kubernetes Pod Creation and Network Traffic Management
item.description: This article delves into the underlying processes involved in creating a pod and traces the path of network traffic within a Kubernetes cluster, from an initial web request to the container hosting the application. We will explore: What steps involved in the pod creation How containers communicate locally (Intra-Pod communication). Pod-to-Pod communication when the pods are on the same and different nodes. Pod-to-Service communication, where a pod sends traffic to another pod behind a service in Kubernetes.
